attributes.action:
David cameron to state 
sharia law will never become part of british law.
attributes.additional_details:
Many muslim clerics have stated openly that a muslim man according to sharia law can rape, beat, and kill women......
They can also violently control her....
As a british woman i find this highly offensive and abhorant...and call on David Cameron to denounce sharia law in the uk.
attributes.background: Sharia law nullifies equal rights for women within british law.
